name: io.github.m2ai-mcp-servers/loom-mcp
description: MCP server for Loom video management. Provides tools to list, retrieve, edit, and merge Loom screen recordings.

required.name: LOOM_ACCESS_TOKEN
required.description: OAuth2 access token for Loom API from https://dev.loom.com

tools.name: list_recorded_videos
tools.description: Retrieve a list of recorded videos with pagination and folder filtering

tools.name: get_video
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific video

tools.name: edit_video
tools.description: Edit videos by trimming or extracting clips
